contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1383-2017 to designate 4 Avenue Road (Park Plaza Hotel) (Trinity-Spadina, Ward 20) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE24.9 - Alterations to a Heritage Property, Designation of a Heritage Property and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement- 4 Avenue Road (Park Plaza Hotel)
By-law 1383-2017 - To designate the property at 4 Avenue Road (Park Plaza Hotel) being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1383-2017 - 4 Avenue Road (Park Plaza Hotel)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
